page.title: 08INDUSTRY
page.content: {Industry }does not play a majr part in the lives of the people of Biggar with the possible exception of{ {Cuthbertson's. }This firm is involved with making machinery for the North Sea and hiring out items such as bulldozers for road work. Apart from this firm there is nothing else that can be classed as Industrial in { {Biggar}.Indeed this typical for the area as Agriculture and Tourism are the mainstays of the local economy.Nor indeed is {Biggar }a centre for extractive industries like coal or iron.
